DOC.brief_summary: Rehabilitation program improves operative results following conventional open colorectal surgery. Very few data are available on such program in laparoscopic colorectal surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Benefit of Rehabilitation Program in Colorectal Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The aim is to assess rehabilitation program in laparoscopic colorectal surgery in terms of 30 days peri operative complications
